Animation Typography RWD Flex Grid Border Radius Color Pseudo ☰

UralsCss

Documentation

Getting started

Download the "uralscss.min.js" and put it in the body of the html file.

      <!DOCTYPE html>
        <html lang="en">
          <title> </title>
          <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
          <body>
            <script src="uralscss.min.js">
          </body>
      </html>

Then try to write cool class names as you will see below.

Style guide

Animation

class="ani(swing,.4s,i)"
class="ani(change,1.8s,i)"
class="ani(change2,1.8s,i)"
class="ani(move,1.8s,i)"
class="ani(move2,1.8s,i)"
class="ani(move3,1.8s,i)"
class="ani(rotate-center,1.8s,i)"
class="ani(rotate-move,1.8s,i)"
class="ani(rotate-scale,1.8s,i)"
class="ani(fade,1.8s,i)"
class="ani(fade2,1.8s,i)"
class="ani(shake,1.8s,i)"

Typography – text-shadow

Text-shadow: 4px 4px 4px #aaa

Text-shadow: 0 5px 10px black

Text-shadow: 0 0 10px #3f5fa7

class="ts(4,4,4,aaa)"
class="ts(0,5,10,black)"
class="ts(0,0,10,3f5fa7)"

w(100)

w(100)
w(50)@s
w(1/3)@m
w(25)@l
w(100)
w(50)@s
w(1/3)@m
w(25)@l
w(100)
w(50)@s
w(1/3)@m
w(25)@l
w(100)
w(50)@s
w(1/3)@m
w(25)@l
w(50)@s = @media screen and (min-width: 576px) { width:50% } 
w(1/3)@m = @media screen and (min-width: 768px) { width:33.333% }
w(1/4)@l = @media screen and (min-width: 992px) { width:20% }
class="w(100)"
class="w(50)"
class="w(25)"
class="w(1/3)"
class="w(1/4)"
class="w(1/6)"
w(100) = width:100%
w(50) = width:50%
w(25) = width:25%
w(1/3) = width:33.333%
w(1/4) = width:20%
w(1/6) = width:16.666%

Flex

class="df jc-sb"
display:flex;
justify-content:space-between
class="df jc-sa"
display:flex;
justify-content:space-around
class="df jc-cen"
display:flex;
justify-content:center
df = display:flex;
dfw = display:flex;  flex-wrap:wrap;
dfc = display:flex;  flex-direction:column;
dif = display:inline-flex;
difc = display:inline-flex;  flex-direction:column;
fdc = flex-direction:column;
fdr = flex-direction:row;
fdcr = flex-direction:column-reverse;
fdrr = flex-direction:row-reverse;
fww = flex-wrap:wrap;
fwr = flex-wrap:wrap-reverse;
fwn = flex-wrap:nowrap;
fg(x) = flex-grow:x;
fs(x) = flex-shrink:x;
fb(x) = flex-basis:x;

Grid

class="dg gg(10px) gtc(200px-1fr)"
display:grid;
grid-gap:10px;
grid-template-column:200px 1fr;
            
dg = display:grid;
gg(x) = grid-gap:x;
gtc(x-x...) = grid-template-column:x x...;

Border

ba = border on all sides
bt = border top
br = border right
bb = border bottom
bl = border left
ba(0) = border none
by = vertical border
bx = horizontal border
ba(d) = border on all sides (style: dashed)
ba(o) = border on all sides (style: dotted)
ba(10) = border on all sides (width: 10px)
class="ba(1)"
class="bt(1)"
class="br(1)"
class="bb(1)"
class="bl(1)"
class="by(1)"
class="bx(1)"
class="ba(d)"
class="ba(o)"
class="ba(10)"

Border radius

r(5)
r(15)
r(p) - a capsule shape
r(c)
r(t,8) = top 8px
r(r,8) = right 8px
r(b,8) = bottom 8px
r(l,8) = left 8px
r(tl,20) = top-left 20px
r(tr,20) = top-right 20px
r(bl,20) = bottom-left 20px
r(br,20) = bottom-right 20px
class="r(5)"
class="r(15)"
class="r(p)"
class="r(c)"
class="r(t,8)"
class="r(r,8)"
class="r(b,8)"
class="r(l,8)"
class="r(tl,20)"
class="r(tr,20)"
class="r(bl,20)"
class="r(br,20)"
